text: Gunnar Hansen (March 4, 1947 - November 7, 2015) was an Icelandic-American actor and author. He was best known for playing the mentally-ill cannibal Leatherface in The Texas Chain Saw Massacre (1974). Hansen was born in Reykjavík, Iceland. He was raised in Maine and in Austin, Texas. He studied at the University of Texas at Austin. Hansen died of pancreatic cancer on November 7, 2015 at the age of 68.'Texas Chainsaw Massacre' Actor Gunnar Hansen Dies at 68 ==References== ==Other websites== *Gunnar Hansen official web site * Category:1947 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from Austin, Texas Category:The Texas Chainsaw Massacre (franchise) Category:Actors from Maine Category:American movie actors Category:American video game actors Category:Cancer deaths in Maine Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Gunnar Hansen Category:Writers from Maine Category:Writers from Texas Category:Actors from Reykjavík
title: Gunnar Hansen
